channel.title: Research on Massimiliano Canzi
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Massimiliano Canzi

item.title: awards
item.description: Awards 2018 Stefano Coretta, Massimiliano Canzi (joint winners) of Best Student Abstract submitted to the LAGB (Linguistic Association of Great Britain) 2018 conference with the abstract titled: ‘The effect of lexical frequency on vowel phonation as a correlate of /t/- glottaling’
